description: Chiseled, good-looking Wesley Woods has been stuck in the house for weeks mourning his husband. He receives a letter in the mail from him instructing Wesley to go out, and get back to being the pig slut he used to be. Wesley is moved by the letter, and decides to fulfill his late husband’s wishes. He’s instructed to return to the warehouse where they first met, and meets a horny, hung Leon Lewis. Ripped Leon is ready for some action as he approaches a nervous Wesley with his big dick ready to get things popping!
title: Last Will And Fuck Part 1
